jd: From: Rohit Singh, Vyzeinc rohit.singh@vyzeinc.com Reply to: rohit.singh@vyzeinc.com the client does 2 rounds interview , one video one onsite. need Local CandidatesMust have Local candidates and these skill 5-8 /years Angular/TypeScript Developer. .Net exposure would be very helpful. However, this role is 80% front end development with Angular and TypeScript.Job Title - Sr. Angular TypeScript DeveloperLocation- Villa Park, IL ( Hybrid)Visa- USC and GCSr. Angular/TypeScript Developer for a 12-month hybrid remote contract position. Our client is based in Villa Park, IL and this position requires 2 days a week ONSITE (Wednesdays and Thursdays). The selected developer will work on a mix of new development and enhancements to existing applications. The majority of the development will be in Angular/TypeScript, but candidate should also have some knowledge of SQL Server and .NET for some back-end development and data validation. The ideal candidate will also have experience with component libraries, ADA compliance, and a strong understanding of UX/UI principles. Responsibilities:Develop and maintain web applications using Angular and TypeScript.Build self-contained and reusable modules and components.Collaborate with UX/UI designers to implement and maintain design systems, ensuring a consistent and high-quality user experience.Design, develop, and maintain component libraries that are ADA-compliant.Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing.Collaborate with back-end developers in the process of building RESTful APIs.Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.Troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise.Requirements:5+ years of experience with Angular (experience with v. 14 or higher within the past year).Strong proficiency in TypeScript, HTML, CSS3, and JavaScript.Some experience with .NET.Knowledge of NodeJS and its ecosystem.Knowledge of consuming REST APIs.Experience with designing systems and implementing them in web applications.Familiarity with front-end build tools and development processes.Understanding of responsive design principles.Strong communication and teamwork abilities.Preferred Qualifications:Knowledge of ADA compliance standards and best practices for web accessibility.Experience with other front-end frameworks and libraries.Knowledge of back-end technologies and RESTful APIs.Basic understanding of SQL for data validation and the ability to execute T-SQL in SSMS.Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies.Experience with Nx.Experience with Visual Studio Code (VS Code).
